name: Offroad Legend Stunt Driving
description:
Taste the deadly dunes of Sahara with powerful off-road machines. Hit the gas and climb up to the top of the world! Do you have what it takes to survive this hell?
Get ready to drive the latest offroad legends carefully and become one of the best extreme 4x4 legends masters. In the extreme Offroad legends Stunt Driving Fun, the driving game has the narrow and sharp crazy tracks are built over the sea in the endless blue sky. This game has many amazing and challenging missions. Drive extreme legends on impossible tracks and reach the destination within the time limit to complete the mission. Get coins maximum to unlock favorite 4x4 offroad legends. As a real legends driving master you should reach the destination in time limit otherwise you will fail the mission. So, play a thrilling offroad mission with extreme vehicles and get to the finish line within time.

Choose your favorite powerful car in Offroad Legends Stunt Driving Fun and drive it through rough tracks. In offroad 4x4 adventure 2018 select your favorite ride and start discovering the most dangerous and curvy offroad tracks missions. You have to complete each impossible mission in order to unlock the next one. Use the different camera views to avoid the crashes and fall downs from the top of the impossible tracks. Be perfect while taking narrow turns. Download the app store game of 2018 and become the real champion of the amazing offroad legends game.
 
 
Gameplay:

• Tap accelerator to move 4x4 vehicle simulator.
• Tap brake button to stop the legends.
• Use gear to move forward/backward Prado.
• Multiple offroad 4x4 legends control.

Features of Offroad legends Stunt Driving Fun 2018:

• Different camera views of Prado driving 3D.
• Realistic sound effects of extreme land cruiser driving.
• Offroad legends driver game has high-quality 3D graphics.
• Multiple 4x4 luxury vehicles added in the driving game.
• Excellent control of Prado simulator.
• Realistic 4x4 driving experience.

If you like Offroad legends Stunt Driving game, please try our other games by clicking “More from Developer” or by visiting our publisher account. And don’t forget to rate and review.
